description: Heidi, a young woman with fair skin, light brown hair, and bright green eyes is the central focus of the selfie. She is wearing red-framed glasses and has her hair styled in two braids, each secured with a blue hair tie near the ends. Her mouth is open in a wide, playful smile, and she is sticking her tongue out. She is wearing a cream-colored sweater with a textured or lacy pattern. The background consists of a blurred outdoor setting. A vibrant green lawn stretches behind her, punctuated by trees and glimpses of brick buildings in the distance. The scene has a soft, natural light, suggesting it is daytime in the spring.
